1384810.name: Dreadnought Battle Ready: Recruit Bundle
1384810.description:
Battle Ready: Recruit Bundle:
Get ready for battle with a Hero Ship, a Captain Outfit, and enough Elite Status and currency to get you through your Recruit assignments. Suit up, ready your fleet, and tell Bix to spin up the Nav Beacon!

This bundle contains:

  • Marauder Hero Ship - Command Captain Baron Roth IV's legendary ship and related ship vanity.
  • Shugyosha Captain outfit.
  • 90 days of Elite Status - Enable you and your allies to progress faster with every battle.
  • 110,000 Credits - Purchase new ships and modules.
  • 2,500 GP - Buy Credits, Hero Ships, Elite Status, captain gear, and ship vanity items.
1384810.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 德语*, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 波兰语, 俄语, 简体中文
*具有完全音频支持的语言
